availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Osborn D. Plummer (Bracken and Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bracken and Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Barnes Plummer. Father of Sarah E. Plummer, Mary Plummer, Robert Plummer, Henry Plummer, and Susan Plummer. Resident of Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 1, p. 385B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 242.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 3, p. 426B.
